From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Perhaps it may have a slight coincidence with our elongated period of
inactivity. As much as I don't agree with it, Afterburner, Strafe and
Scattershot seem to thrive on physical combat." he says, transforming as
he arrives. 

Strafe turns around. "Bout time." is all he says. But is hushed by a
glare from Sunstreaker. Ironhide moves forward. "Hoist will give you
orders on clearing the ruble, I need to check on Pacifix." he says,
transforming into his van mode, and driving off, followed closely by
Sunstreaker.

Hoist turns around. "Nosecone, you may as well take down what is left of
that wall." he says pointing to a wall damaged in the fight. "If
Afterburner and Lightspeed could come with me, Scattershot and Strafe
can gather up ruble, and sort it." he says, content with  his directions
he transforms, and drives off. Lightspeed looks at Afterburner, then
does the same and follows.
